::KitKat:;

She received a message from Land Mine.  She stood in shock for a 
moment.  She opened her link. "DRILLBIT, ECHTINGAR, Please go and 
help Land Mine and Time Bomb. Before they get killed!"
She knew she wouldn't have enough time to even try, but she hoped the 
others would be closer to them to try to save them.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> SAB + 1 walk out of the woods, they just walk out into a field, 
playing nicely since they were drunk.
> 
> "Meeting you guys was the best thing that ever happened to me." 
Rizopas says. He pours a beer on his head. Blender laughs and pours a 
beer on Rizopas' head. He looks around to make sure nobody is 
watching them. Stronghold leans up against a tree, making funny 
sounds and peeling an apple down to nothing with his finger!
> 
> Land Mine and Time Bomb leave the base in shame, why did this 
always happen to them? Whatever, they had to find KitKat.
> 
> "KitKat left because of us, I know it!" Land Mine said. She was 
crying again. Time Bomb growled and walked on. They both walked 
through the field that SAB were in in their search for KitKat.
> 
> "We need to apologize to her, she thought we loved pain, but 
really, we just need it to bring back the memories and because we 
deserved it." Time Bomb said.
> 
> "Right on, brother!" Stronghold said. They both look at SAB and 
Company.
> 
> "Brother?" Time Bomb asked.
> 
> "I'm not your brother, skank!" Blender yelled.
> 
> "Who is my brother?" Rizopas asked.
> 
> "My brother is dead, I kill he!" Stronghold said with a laugh.
> 
> "Kill these 2, yes?" Rizopas asked.
> 
> "Yeah, lets kill those pansies." Stronghold said. Blender and 
Stronghold stood up, Rizopas stood up and walked in front of them. 
Time Bomb and Land Mine both stared helplessly.
> 
> "Ilike Rizopas alot more than I liked Arrow, so let's let Rizopas 
live!" Blender suggested to Stronghold.
> 
> "Yeah, we just kill the 2 pansies!" Stronghold said, pointing at 
Time Bomb and Land Mine. Land Mine opens her commlink, she didn't 
think of this before.
> 
> "KitKat? I'd like to say that me and Time Bomb are sorry, we had to 
say it now, because we're about to die, don't bother sending help, 
these 3 guys will have us in a million pieces by the time help 
arives." Land Mine said, she sent that message to KitKat and closed 
her eyes. Time Bomb gulped in fear...
